scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Martie Nees Record
scrape.text: Two Dutch families, brothers and sister-in-laws, meet for a dinner and struggle with the decision of what to do about a brutal crime committed by their sons’. The book is divided up by courses of the meal. Eventually, it’s clear that the much maligned elder brother, whatever his flaws, is the better man. But that is just one of the twists. If I give away anything else it would be a spoiler.
